en_US:
your message has been successfully sent to our staff. You will receive a reply as soon as possible. Best wishes, The Éischte Weltkrich Team
C²DH - Luxembourg Centre for Contemporary and Digital History – Université du Luxembourg – Maison des Sciences Humaines – 11, Porte des Sciences – L-4366 Esch-sur-Alzette (LUXEMBOURG)

C²DH - Luxembourg Centre for Contemporary and Digital History – Université du Luxemburg – Maison des Sciences Humaines – 11, Porte des Sciences – L-4366 Esch-an-der-Alzette (LUXEMBOURG)
de_DE:
